entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 10:00 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 41 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -14.0°C

Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of snow or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 5:40 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or ice pellets with risk of freezing rain. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 5:40 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:40 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
